pkgmetadata.longdescription: Synchrony in Motion Energy Analysis (MEA) Time-Series // A suite of tools useful to read, visualize and export bivariate motion energy time-series. Lagged synchrony between subjects can be analyzed through windowed cross-correlation. Surrogate data generation allows an estimation of pseudosynchrony that helps to estimate the effect size of the observed synchronization. Ramseyer Tschacher (2011) doi:10.1037/a0023419.
